syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Biology 9700

learning_objectives.description: describe the rapid response of the Venus fly trap to stimulation of hairs on the lobes of modified leaves and explain how the closure of the trap is achieved
explain the role of auxin in elongation growth by stimulating proton pumping to acidify cell walls
describe the role of gibberellin in the germination of barley (see 16.3.4)
